jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
About Gofood 

GoFood is the food vertical of Gojek, which enables user order food from restaurants via it’s Android and iOS app. The mission of GoFood as a product is to provide it’s customers with the best possible selection of food at the most affordable price. GO-FOOD is also a market place for restaurants to list their food items and increase their sales. GoFood also has it’s own fleet of drivers with an app where they can accept food orders and earn their daily income out food delivery. So overall it’s an ecosystem consisting of consumers, merchants and drivers which GoFood manages with the ultimate aim of providing best user experience to consumers and growth for merchants and drivers.

What we have
We currently have a team of 40+ engineers across 2 different locations Bangalore and Jakarta. GoFood being one of the largest online food delivery applications, the scale at which this team operates is phenomenal. GoFood has more than 300k merchants and more than 20 millions dishes listed on it’s platform.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Leverage business analysis and statistical method to analyze and derive insight from various in-app and transactional data points
  • Communicate insight using data visualization tool
  • Design and develop regular reports and actionable dashboards to gather insight and track business/product performance
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams of product managers, data engineers, data scientists, and business development team on product experiments, business campaigns, identifying business/product opportunities

• Bachelor degree in statistics, computer science, data science, business analytics, mathematics, or similar quantitative disciplines
  • Fluent in English both written and verbal and have familiarity with SQL
  • Exhibits adequate problem solving, critical thinking, business judgement, and analytical skills
  • Able to collaborate effectively in a team, while managing him/herself independently as needed
  • Knowledge of programming skills in Python/R for data manipulation and analysis is a plus
